```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggfortify)

bbb <- readRDS('bbb_test.RDS')
```



```{r}

bbb %>% 
  group_by(bowl_type) %>%
  summarise(no_wkts = sum(is_wkt == "W"))

```


# Scatterplots
```{r}

bbb %>% ggplot(aes(bowl_avg, bat_avg, color = outcome)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5)


```



```{r}
num_dat <-bbb %>% select(-where(is.factor), outcome) %>% na.omit(where(is.numeric))
pca <- prcomp(num_dat %>% select(-outcome))
autoplot(pca, data = num_dat, colour = "outcome")

```
